activity_id.CCMI2022: Chemistry Climate Model Initiative simulations for the 2022 OA

institution_id.CCCma: Canadian Centre for Climate Modelling and Analysis, Environment and Climate Change Canada, Victoria, BC V8P 5C2, Canada
institution_id.CNRM-CERFACS: CNRM (Centre National de Recherches Meteorologiques, Toulouse 31057, France), CERFACS (Centre Europeen de Recherche et de Formation Avancee en Calcul Scientifique, Toulouse 31057, France)
institution_id.ETH-PMOD: IAC ETH, Zurich and PMOD/WRC, Davos, Switzerland
institution_id.MESSy-Consortium: The Modular Earth Submodel System (MESSy) Consortium, represented by the Institute for Physics of the Atmosphere, Deutsches Zentrum fur Luft- und Raumfahrt (DLR), Wessling, Bavaria 82234, Germany
institution_id.NCAR: National Center for Atmospheric Research, Climate and Global Dynamics Laboratory, 1850 Table Mesa Drive, Boulder, CO 80305, USA
institution_id.NIES: National Institute for Environmental Studies, Ibaraki 305-8506, Japan

CCSRNIES-MIROC32.source:
CCSRNIES-MIROC32 (2020): 
atmos: CCSRNIES-MIROC3.2 (T42; 34 levels; top level 0.01 Pa) 
atmosChem: stratospheric mechanism 
ocean: none

CESM2-WACCM.source:
CESM2-WACCM (2018): 
aerosol: MAM4 (same grid as atmos)
atmos: WACCM6 (0.9x1.25 finite volume grid; 288 x 192 longitude/latitude; 70 levels; top level 4.5e-06 mb)
atmosChem: MAM4 (same grid as atmos)
land: CLM5 (same grid as atmos)
landIce: CISM2.1
ocean: POP2 (320 x 384 longitude/latitude; 60 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m)
ocnBgchem: MARBL (same grid as ocean)
seaIce: CICE5.1 (same grid as ocean)

CMAM.source:
CMAM (2020): 
atmos: CanAM3.1 (T47; 48x96 linear grid; 80 levels; top level 0.08 Pa) 
atmosChem: stratospheric mechanism plus CH4-NOx tropospheric 
ocean: none

EMAC-CCMI2-oce.source:
EMAC-CCMI2-oce (2020): 
atmos: ECHAM5.3.02 (modified, spectral T42; 128 x 64 longitude/latitude; 47 levels; top level 0.01 hPa) 
atmosChem: MECCA 4.4.0.m1 
land: same as Atmosphere 
landIce: none 
ocean: MPIOM 1.3.0-beta (bipolar GR1.5, approximately 1.5deg; 256 x 220 longitude/latitude; 40 levels; top grid cell 0-12 m) 
ocnBgchem: none 
seaIce: thermodynamic (Semtner zero-layer) dynamic (Hibler 79) sea ice model

EMAC-CCMI2.source:
EMAC-CCMI2 (2020): 
atmos: ECHAM5.3.02 (modified, spectral T42; 128 x 64 longitude/latitude; 90 levels; top level 0.01 hPa) 
atmosChem: MECCA 4.4.0.m1 
land: same as Atmosphere
landIce: none 
ocean: none 
ocnBgchem: none 
seaIce: same as Atmosphere

SOCOL.source:
SOCOL: 
atmos: SOCOL (T63; 47 levels; top level 0.01 Pa) 
atmosChem: stratospheric and tropospheric mechanism 
ocean: none

source_type.AER: aerosol treatment in an atmospheric model where concentrations are calculated based on emissions, transformation, and removal processes (rather than being prescribed or omitted entirely)
source_type.AGCM: atmospheric general circulation model run with prescribed ocean surface conditions and usually a model of the land surface
source_type.AOGCM: coupled atmosphere-ocean global climate model, additionally including explicit representation of at least the land and sea ice
source_type.BGC: biogeochemistry model component that at the very least accounts for carbon reservoirs and fluxes in the atmosphere, terrestrial biosphere, and ocean
source_type.CHEM: chemistry treatment in an atmospheric model that calculates atmospheric oxidant concentrations (including at least ozone), rather than prescribing them
source_type.CTM: chemistry transport model, calculating transport and chemistry using specified meteorological fields
source_type.LAND: land model run uncoupled from the atmosphere
source_type.OGCM: ocean general circulation model run uncoupled from an AGCM but, usually including a sea-ice model
source_type.RAD: radiation component of an atmospheric model run 'offline'
source_type.SLAB: slab-ocean used with an AGCM in representing the atmosphere-ocean coupled system

frequency.10dayPt: sampled approximately every 10 days, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.dayPt: sampled daily, at specified time point within the time period

grid_label.gn: data reported on a model's native grid
grid_label.gnz: zonal mean data reported on a model's native latitude grid
grid_label.gr: regridded data reported on the data provider's preferred target grid
grid_label.grz: regridded zonal mean data reported on the data provider's preferred latitude target grid
grid_label.gr1: regridded data reported on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr1z: regridded zonal mean data reported on a grid other than the native latitude grid and other than the preferred latitude target grid
grid_label.gr2: regridded data reported on a grid other than the native grid and other than the preferred target grid
grid_label.gr2z: regridded zonal mean data reported on a grid other than the native latitude grid and other than the preferred latitude target grid

refD2.experiment: Baseline projection using CMIP6 SSP2-45 GHGs and precursor emissions with WMO-2018 ODSs

senD2-geo.experiment: Baseline (SSP2-45) with geoengineering using specified stratospheric aerosol distribution and specified SSTs/sea-ice

senD2-ssp126.experiment: Future projection using CMIP6 SSP1-26 GHGs and precursor emissions with WMO-2018 ODSs

senD2-ssp370.experiment: Future projection using CMIP6 SSP3-70 GHGs and precursor emissions with WMO-2018 ODSs
